tool_description: An API to show upcoming IPOs
name: IPO Announcer
title: IPO Announcer

api_list.name: Get Individual IPO Lister Listing
api_list.description: Returns Listings of Upcoming IPOs from an Individual Lister
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ipo-announcer.p.rapidapi.com/ipo/marketwatch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ipo-announcer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ipo-announcer.p.rapidapi.com/ipo/{ipoid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ipo-announcer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All IPO Announcements
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all upcoming IPO Announcements
